PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Modules
HAL functions

All API functions of the HAL component. More...

Modules

 USART controlling
 

Functions used to send and receive data over USART.


 SPI
 

Functions used to send and receive data over SPI.


 External interrupts
 

Functions for controlling external interrupts: registering/unregistering, disabling/enabling.


 1-Wire
 

Functions used to send and receive data over SPI.


 USB
 

Functions used to implement USB devices logic, register handlers, configure endpoints, and send and receive data over USB connection; see Using USB API.


 I2C
 

Functions used to send and receive data over I2C interface.


 PWM
 

Functions for controlling PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) interface.


 Watch Dog timer
 

Functions for controlling a Watch Dog timer: if such timer is started for a certain period of time or is not stopped or reset during this period, then device's hardware is reset.


 Miscellaneous
 

HAL functions used for various purposes including functions that invoke hardware reset or read UID (extended address).


Detailed Description

All API functions of the HAL component.
